name: Zeroth: Droids Attack
description:
Zeroth is an unconventional tower defense game.
You will have to use a limited number of towers and modify your defense plan dinamically. Zeroth is played from a third person perspective, as you will be able to shoot enemies yourself.

Take a look at our trailer!

Note: Unfortunately, we couldn't finish our project because of fundings. Please, if you like the game, let us know with a comment or a donation!

For a more detailed description:   Pitch Document
